chapters.title: Chapter 17:  A Bronze Bear
chapters.info:
Derys Nermala,
      p. 378â€”One of the
      Kin.  She did penance as a servant for trying to get
      married before the Kin were dispersed by the Seanchan.  She is now with

      Vandene, she likes to hear herself talk.
